mapper.select: SELECT C.PLNT_CD, A.REQ_IDX, C.ANS_IDX, C.RST_SEQ, C.RST_FILE_IDX AS FILE_IDX, A.PITM_SPEC_IDX, F.PITM_TYP, F.PITM_CD, F.PITM_NM, I.AITM_CD, I.AITM_KN, H.VRIA_NO, H.VRIA_KN, C.ANS_DPT_CD, (SELECT DPT_NM FROM SY_DPT WHERE DPT_CD = C.ANS_DPT_CD AND PLNT_CD = C.PLNT_CD) AS ANS_DPT_NM, C.ANS_UID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER WHERE USER_ID = C.ANS_UID AND PLNT_CD = C.PLNT_CD) AS ANS_NM, C.PERSPEC_TXT, C.OWC_SPEC_TXT, C.SPEC_TYP, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = C.SPEC_TYP) AS SPEC_TYP_NM, C.JDG_TYP, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = C.JDG_TYP) AS JDG_TYP_NM, (DECODE(SUBSTR(C.RST_VAL, 0, 4), 'U008', (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = C.RST_VAL AND PLNT_CD = C.PLNT_CD), RST_VAL)) AS RST_VAL, C.MARK_VAL, C.RST_UNIT_CD, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = C.RST_UNIT_CD AND PLNT_CD = C.PLNT_CD) AS RST_UNIT_NM, C.RPT_PRT_ITM_NM, C.RST_JDG, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = C.RST_JDG) AS RST_JDG_NM, C.RPT_PRT_SLV_VAL, C.RST_RMK, C.ANS_RST_INP_DS, C.RST_DPNT, C.PER_SLV_LOW, C.PER_SLV_UPP, C.PER_SLV_DESC, C.OWC_SLV_LOW, C.OWC_SLV_UPP, C.OWC_SLV_DESC, C.RPT_PRT_YN, A.ANS_PROC_CD, C.RST_PROC_CD, A.ANS_NO, C.AMITM_CD, C.SLV_JDG_CFM, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = C.SLV_JDG_CFM AND PLNT_CD = C.PLNT_CD) AS SLV_JDG_CFM_NM, C.SLV_JDG_NON_CFM, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = C.SLV_JDG_NON_CFM AND PLNT_CD = C.PLNT_CD) AS SLV_JDG_NON_CFM_NM, ((SELECT COUNT(FILE_SRLNO) FROM SY_FILE_INFO WHERE FILE_IDX = C.RST_FILE_IDX AND DEL_YN = 'N') || '건') AS FILE_CNT, C.MKR_QTY, C.AITM_RMK FROM QT_PITM_ANS_PROC A JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_INFO B ON A.PLNT_CD = B.PLNT_CD AND A.ANS_IDX = B.ANS_IDX JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_RST C ON A.PLNT_CD = C.PLNT_CD AND A.ANS_IDX = C.ANS_IDX JOIN QM_PITM_SPEC D ON A.PLNT_CD = D.PLNT_CD AND A.PITM_SPEC_IDX = D.PITM_SPEC_IDX JOIN QM_PITM E ON D.PLNT_CD = E.PLNT_CD AND D.PITM_CD = E.PITM_CD AND D.PITM_VER = E.PITM_VER JOIN QM_PITM_INFO F ON E.PLNT_CD = F.PLNT_CD AND E.PITM_CD = F.PITM_CD AND E.PITM_VER = F.PITM_VER JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_REQ G ON A.PLNT_CD = G.PLNT_CD AND A.REQ_IDX = G.REQ_IDX JOIN MS_AMITM H ON C.AMITM_CD = H.AMITM_CD JOIN MS_AITM I ON H.AITM_CD = I.AITM_CD WHERE A.ANS_IDX = #{ansIdx} AND A.ANS_PROC_CD = #{ansProcCd} AND A.HLD_YN = 'N' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY C.RST_SEQ
